thread.title: Osinbajo to commission The Dome in Ondo today
thread.title_full: Osinbajo to commission The Dome in Ondo today

author: adekunle
title: Osinbajo to commission The Dome in Ondo today
text:
Home » News » Osinbajo to commission The Dome in Ondo today Osinbajo to commission The Dome in Ondo today On 11:20 pm In News by adekunle Comments 
By Dayo Johnson Akure—ACTING President, Yemi Osibajo will today inaugurate the International Event Centre, also known as The Dome in Akure, the Ondo State capital. 
Information Commissioner Kayode Akinmade announcedThursday. 
Akinmade added that a Mega school will be commissioned in Ijapo on the same day, while the Aboto water scheme in Ilaje , in the Southern Senatorial District of the state will be performed on Saturday. 
He said though Ilaje people live on water, the launch of the water scheme will make it the first time in the history of the people to enjoy treated water. 
According to him all necessary arrangements have been made towards the inauguration of the The Dome by Vice President Osibajo, the structure which has three Oval Domes with modern architecture, with the hall in each of the Dome capable of sitting 5,000 guests and three events simultaneously.
